channel.title: My addon for BM is not working in Workshop
channel.description: Well, my add-on is a Russian Localization Fix,there it is: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=936168105[/url] It changes some original files in "resource" and "scripts" and it works well in "custom" or "bms" folder, but when I tried to move it to Workshop, I found out that it does not work from there, and hieroglyphs is still there, in menu. can someone help me with it to make it work in Workshop? There are some people waiting for it in workshop.

item.title: My addon for BM is not working in Workshop
item.dc:creator: Matias-TM
item.description:
Really, 75% addons are published to Workshop doesn’t work. Excluding the maps, obviously.

Read full topic
item.source: My addon for BM is not working in Workshop

item.title: My addon for BM is not working in Workshop
item.dc:creator: Stavaas
item.description:
Well, my add-on is a Russian Localization Fix,there it is:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=936168105
It changes some original files in “resource” and “scripts” and it works well in “custom” or “bms” folder, but when I tried to move it to Workshop, I found out that it does not work from there, and hieroglyphs is still there, in menu. can someone help me with it to make it work in Workshop? There are some people waiting for it in workshop.

Read full topic
item.source: My addon for BM is not working in Workshop
